## Hand.(constructor)

Holds a wad of cards, where each card is displayed separately.

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(CardType: {
        new (...args: any[]): TCard;
    }, width: number, options?: IHandOptions<TCard>);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  CardType | { new (...args: any\[\]): TCard; } | Constructor for the type of card stored in this container. Used to find the card dimensions. |
|  width | number | Maximum width of the area that hand cards are displayed in, in centimeters. |
|  options | [IHandOptions](./bge-core.ihandoptions.md)<!-- -->&lt;TCard&gt; | _(Optional)_ Optional configuration options. |
